column4: list of supported linux handhelds and guides on how to do it ... http://www.handhelds.org/moin/moin.cgi/SupportedHandheldSummary
if you want an 'easy' linux phone, look into maemo ... it's put out by nokia, and is real linux, not just a linux kernel like android is
windows 7 remote desktop is rdp, not vnc ... 'sudo apt-get install xrdp tsclient'
